sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <v-row justify="center">
        <v-col cols="12" md="8">
          <v-card class="pa-6" color="#efebe9">
            <v-card-title class="text-h4">상품 등록</v-card-title>
            <v-form @submit.prevent="registerProduct">
              <v-text-field
                label="상품명"
                v-model="name"
                :rules="[rules.required]"
                required
              ></v-text-field>
              <v-textarea
                label="상품설명"
                v-model="description"
                :rules="[rules.required]"
                required
              ></v-textarea>
              <v-text-field
                label="가격"
                v-model="price"
                type="number"
                :rules="[rules.required]"
                required
              ></v-text-field>
              <v-file-input
                label="상품 사진 업로드"
                ref="files"
                multiple
                @change="handleFileUpload"
              ></v-file-input>
              <v-btn
                color="#a1887f"
                class="mr-4"
                type="submit"
                :loading="loading"
              >
                상품등록하기
              </v-btn>
              <router-link to="{ name: 'ShopListPage' }">
                <v-btn color="#bcaaa4" text>취소</v-btn>
              </router-link>
            </v-form>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      name: "",
      description: "",
      price: "",
      files: "",
      loading: false,
      rules: {
        required: (value) => !!value || "필수 항목입니다.",
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    registerProduct() {
      const { name, description, price, files } = this;
      this.loading = true;
      this.$emit("submit", { name, description, price, files });
      this.loading = false;
    },
    handleFileUpload() {
      this.files = this.$refs.files.$el.files;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-application {
  background-color: #d7ccc8;
}
</style>
